DOD:
1. On Payments' page, there is new nameless column in data grid, which holds button with name "CORRECT" (with appliance of button conventions).
2. On button "CORRECT" click, Dialog with ability to correct user's payment is open with next fields:

  • Amount, UAH;
  • Description

3. On Payments' page, there is new column "Corrections", which holds value of summed user's corrections

dev notes:
1. Besides of other fields of Correction model on BE, create 'created' field with LocalDateTime type and TIMESTAMP(0) type in DataBase. Also, use @CreatedDate annotation on that field

2. 'Correction' amount format is 'money' with all the related restrictions

3. Add proper validations on BE and FE

4. Add tests

When we were talking about future payment calculations KT decided to pay ЄСВ + 5% від ЗП every month. So, it seems like we don't need anymore calculate taxes for full quarter only for current month.

DOD:

  • Taxes(ЄСВ + 5% від ЗП) for current open payment should calculated only for current month;
  • Adjustments are applied starting with April month;
  • Calculation strategy version is updated;
  • Document with payment calculation strategy description is created (for current and next strategies)

dev notes:

  • Think about changing strategy version from ENUM to STRING

Take into account in payments' calculations the fact that after war KT pays single tax at once (without its 3-month accumulation).

Message from KT:
"і ще така штука: оскільки я 2 останні місяці плачу єдиний податок одразу і суми по ньому не аккумулюються на рахунку, а payroll про це не в курсі, то минулого місяці майже всі суми відрізнялися від екскльки. З цим можна щось зробити швидко? Як ні, то неважливо."

There is open question: how or where should be saved history of counting ЄСВ and amount of single tax for every month to compare with ЄСВ and amount of single tax which counted an accountant

DOD:
1. Payments are adjusted to KT's requirements. All payment numbers are correct

dev:

  • There is a field 'isRemote' on the users page after a field 'email' with value 'true' or 'false'
  • Set up or change the value 'isRemote' can only user with role Admin
  • Each user should contain the field 'isRemote'

DOD:

  • Default value 'isRemote' is 'false'
  • User with role Admin can update the field 'isRemote'
  • There is the field 'isRemote' on the users page after the field 'email'
  • User service should return user which has the field 'isRemote'

DOD:

  1. The Bank Fee value is included in payments' Final Amount calculations
  2. BankFee is applied to Contractors only
  3. The Bank Fee value is calculated by formula:

BankFee = Cash (Column P) * CorporateCardWirePercent (column N) + CorporateCardExtra (column Q)

where the value of CorporateCardWirePercent - corresponds the period BankFee is calculated for
value of CorporateCardExtra - corresponds the period BankFee is calculated for

  1. CorporateCardExtra is added to calculations every January and only for those, who is Corporate Card Holder

dev notes:

  1. ATM, the name of this column on BE is 'corporateCardFee'. Rename it to 'bankFee'
  2. CorporateCardWirePercent and CorporateCardExtra values can be added to CorporateCardFeeCalculator through constructor dependency injections
  3. the BankFee is calculated on BE in a separate calculator - BankFeeCalculator
  4. CorporateCardWirePercent is taken from last row of database
  5. CorporateCardExtra is taken from last row of database

dev:

DOD:

  • This column is positioned after 'Full Name' column
  • The value 'Personal Wire' is the same as that in SpreadSheet 'Card Wire' column

Probably this ticket will be split into more.

  1. Investigate how to add UUID to request(s) which is passing through all microservices, probably needs investigation of all possible workflows and interactions between microservices
  2. add lib, service, which can easily be plugged into NodeJs and Spring, which adds UUID to requests
  3. Investigate how to store and aggregate logs, with the possibility to search by UUID
  4. implement/use service - for storing and aggregating logs
  5. add library/service to each BE to send logs to a centralized place

DOD:

  1. Document with existing solutions for adding UUID's to http requests;
  2. Integrate http request with a new library - for adding UUID's to requests
  3. Document with a description of services and or frameworks and or libraries which can store, aggregate, and give a possibility to search in logs
  4. Merge request, or new deployment, or credentials to a service, which will be storing logs
  5. Merge request for NodeJS and Spring adding external logger lib to report each action to a centralized log store.
    (optional)
  6. Investigate how to import existing logs to new centralized system

Due to dropped support of Enzyme (lib for mounting/rendering/simmulating/interaction with react components) we need to migrate to RTL (react testing library)

DOD:

  • existing tests are passing successfully (as previously)

  • dependencies on Enzyme (and adapters) are dropped from the project

  • libs we use for testing are upgraded to the latest version

dev:

  1. Admin is able to update 'Exchange rate' value
  2. Admin is able to update 'Coworking cost' value
  3. When admin updates Exchange rate in AdminSettings it should update only Exchange rate
  4. When admin updates Coworking cost in AdminSettings it should update only Coworking cost
  5. New table 'Exchange rate' is added in DB
  6. New table 'Coworking cost' is added in DB

DOD:

  1. On Admins' page, there are new updatable fields - 'Exchange rate', 'Coworking cost'.
  2. The field has 'money' format with appropriate validations
  3. It should be possible to define the Exchange rate and Coworking cost values for specific date in payroll history

formula:

  1. for Employees (only ?) - manual input two times a month by admin

DOD:

  1. the Card Wire column is present on Payments' page

  2. Admin can edit field Card Wire  on Payments' page for Employees

  3. CardWire field value is used in Payment total calculations

dev notes:

  1. Name of this column on BE is 'personalCardWire'
  2. Ask KT whether this value should be resetted every month -> find the most comfort way to set this value for Employees

DOD:

  • Admin can update "Cash" column on Payments Page for open Payment
  • A value which admin updates in Payments Page should apply only for current open Payment for the current month
  • If the admin doesn't update "Cash" column on the Payments Page, the value(default value for Staffer which will apply every next month) should take from the Staffer

formula:

ROUND ( Final (Column M) - Card Wire (column O) )

dev:

  • SalaryCalculator
  • PtoCompensantionCalculator

  • School service has an environment that is a mirror to prod environment within:
    • resources
    • data
    • stack
  • CI/CD is configured to run tests on every MR creation
  • E2E tests are running on QA environment every morning
  • Credentials are stored in the Infrastructure repository
  • DNS is configured to support *-qa.intelliarts.com web apps
  • E2E reports are accessible from QA environment

DOD:

  1. Dynamic setting of ENV vars in dotenv file in dockerized services is working properly

dev notes:

  1. Dynamic setting means when you change ENV var in dotenv file on server, it should be exported without a need to redeploy/repost image through running pipeline
  2. There might be no straightforward solution => this ticket should be timeboxed

  • PROFIT

  1. Both stage and prod environment, Nodejs, Java-based applications send logs to Loggly.

for","targetToSource":"subtask of","name":"Subtask","$type":"IssueLinkType"},"issues":[],"id":"93-3t","$type":"IssueLink"}],"resolved":null,"summary":"Change Tax calculation approach","reporter":{"login":"system_user@a4wQ6h27MH","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

Currently, we calculate Taxes for the current month and for 1-3 months in the previous quarter. The number of months to recalculate depend on the current month number (details). Taking into account the balance of the account we adjust the new amount of money required for accumulation.

This epic is about splitting this functionality into two independent activities: Tax calculation and Balance adjustment. The aim of the Tax calculations is to collect required amount of money smoothly during the tax period (1 quarter). The aim of the Balance adjustment is to ensure account has enough money on its balance to pay taxes.

Tax calculation is done in the same way regardless current month number.
0.05*(SingleTax) + <0.22*MinimalWage>(SingelSocialContribution)
Tax calculation is done for every payment calculation and the calculated value is saved as tax details of the Payment (separate field?)

Balance adjustment is done once per three months, on the first month of the quartal. During Rebalancing, we sum Taxes calculated for three months of just ended quarter (can be read from DB) and current month. The result should equal the amount of money left on Employee Balance. The difference is saved in a separate field of the Payment.

Later, when the Payment total is calculated, we take into account the Payment base (sum of other payment fields) + calculated Taxes + Balance adjustment. If the Balance adjustment makes the Payment total be negative then the Payment total should be set to 0.

UPD Taxes for individual FOP are payed in two transactions.
1 - SSC till 19th of the first month of the next quarter
2 - ST till 19th of the second month of the next quarter
It may later be required to have two Rabalances. First in the first month to ensure that SSC can be payd this month. Second Rebalancing is done in the second month to ensure that ST can be payed at that time.

for","targetToSource":"subtask of","name":"Subtask","$type":"IssueLinkType"},"issues":[{"idReadable":"P-299","$type":"Issue"}],"id":"93-3t","$type":"IssueLink"}],"resolved":null,"summary":"Support user specific PaydDayOffs","reporter":{"login":"vdmytruk","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

Currently, the PTO service assumes that all users have 20 PaydDayOffs (PDO). In practice, there are a few exceptions. E.g. parents have additional 5 PaydDayOffs, Those who spent 20 days for vacations have additional 2 PaydDayOffs. Hubspot team has some PDO paid by the customer.

This story is about dealing with such cases.
Acceptance criteria

  • It is possible to configure the number of PDO per employee
  • Employee related number of PDO is used for PTO calculations
  • Default value for PDO is 20

This card is follow up for P-45

you can read an article about why keep secrets in the encrypted state:
https://www.datree.io/resources/secrets-management-aws

in the article are highlighted only a few secret managers, thus for our purposes, it will be easier to use docker secret manager(since we are migrating to doker solution):
https://docs.docker.com/engine/swarm/secrets/

DOD:
Option 1 - if we are staying with the doker as microservice manager:

  1. Setup doker secret manager

Option 2 - if we will start migrating to a cloud solution(aws, azure, google etc.):

  1. setup cloud service

  2. slowly move all apps to use it

DOD:

  • The expected behaviour is met

Expected behaviour:

  1. The user is visiting https://luncher.intelliarts.com/order/2021-12-15
  2. He fails to pass the authentication check
  3. The user is redirected to login page
  4. The user logins successfully
  5. The user is forwarded to https://luncher.intelliarts.com/order/2021-12-15 URL

Actual behaviour:

  1. The user is visiting https://luncher.intelliarts.com/order/2021-12-15
  2. He fails to pass the authentication check
  3. The user is redirected to the login page
  4. The user logins successfully
  5. The user is forwarded to https://luncher.intelliarts.com URL

of","name":"Subtask","$type":"IssueLinkType"},"issues":[{"idReadable":"O-220","$type":"Issue"}],"id":"93-3t","$type":"IssueLink"}],"resolved":null,"summary":"[Investigation] Add transactional flow for users registration","reporter":{"login":"ocheban","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

Context:
in case if some error occurred and registration failed we have a problem that user exists partially (for example exists in users service, authentication service but doesn't exist in authorization service, etc). To fix such case we need a mechanism to guarantee persistence of users across IA microservices.

Acceptance criteria:

  • there is are no users-ghosts (partially registered users)
  • users that exist in Users service should exist in other services
  • in case of error during registration there is a mechanism to rollback and reregister.

Note: possible flow:
Termins: Users Service (US) | External Service (ES)

  1. On behalf of US trigger registration of users
  2. In case of error do:
    2.1) delete failed users in all ES
    2.2) restart registration flow for failed users in US
  3. log failure reason users in US

Possible edge case - some service is dead and this will lead to infinite loop.

for","targetToSource":"subtask of","name":"Subtask","$type":"IssueLinkType"},"issues":[{"idReadable":"O-86","$type":"Issue"}],"id":"93-3t","$type":"IssueLink"}],"resolved":null,"summary":"Add dependency patcher bot to all IA repositories","reporter":{"login":"ocheban","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

For dependency patching OC decided to use renovate-bot due to active maintainability, wide usage by famous platforms and has easy to install flow.

What was done:

  • investigation how renovate bot works
  • investigation and prototype of configuration for renovate bot
  • tested proof of concept that renovate-bot works with prototyped configuration

How it works:

I found 2 ways of usage of renovate bot.

First approach:

  1. Go to dashboard, check in preferences required repositories, renovate-bot creates Onboarding MR's with default configs for every selected repository.
  2. You should manually edit renovate.json by passing your custom config
  3. Once you will merge Onboarding MR bot will start working.
  4. Schedule a task for renovation in Gitlab CI

Second approach:

  1. You create repository where you store config with all connected repositories listed example
  2. Create scheduled task for renovation in Gitlab CI

NOTE:

There is ability to ask for help from renovate bot devs about configuration.

for","targetToSource":"subtask of","name":"Subtask","$type":"IssueLinkType"},"issues":[{"idReadable":"O-220","$type":"Issue"}],"id":"93-3t","$type":"IssueLink"}],"resolved":null,"summary":"Change flow of users registration in external services to asynchronous","reporter":{"login":"ocheban","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

Currently flow is synchronous - if authentication service fails to proceed users, than authorization service is not being triggered.

Acceptance criteria:

  • users are registered in authentication service and authorization service independently
  • error about failed operations shouldn't break the request.

Note: to implement such flow OC suggests extracting errors to error oblect that will live in Request object instead of throwing them. And finally, when all processes finished - respond with success or error status and log.

Disclaimer:
this ticket is about creating ridiculously stupid features, which should be done only in spare time and on any developers wish;

So far 'useful' features:

  1. Button on luncher - гречаникі всім:
  • doing fake order(original order remains) of гречаники, todo panic mode in company
  1. -30% slack bot reaction:
  • if KT sends to anyone -30% emoji, then payroll slack bot reads this person salary(out team should not have access to this info), and sends a private message with ${salary-30%}
  1. Phone call(email) to KT in case of a manual copy of the sheet, with crying from our scheduler that it wanted to copy but was not able to

Mail-service Java client","reporter":{"login":"ykoval","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

DOD:

  • API Facade Class and Models of Mail-service are extracted to Java library
  • Mail-Service connection properties are read from the Documented path of the application.properties
  • Java library JAR is hosted in Gitlab Maven repository and available only for authorized users
  • The Mail-Client JAR is built, released (version management) and deployed via CI/CD
  • The Mail-Client is used in 1 BE project (e.g. Payroll)
  • ReadME with "How To Setup & Use" instruction is created

dev notes:

  • as a sample for analogy approach can be used Authorization client
  • for release should be used semantic-release pipeline
  • commitlint lib with IA conventions should be also installed
